kern_elliot.bio: Kern Elliott has over 15 years of IT experience in operations and application management. He holds a computing science degree from the University of Greenwich and received his Masters in Information Systems Management from the University of Liverpool. Kern has also acquired a range of technical skills, including proficiency in various programming languages, CMS software and database software.
kern_elliot.company: The National ICT Company of Trinidad and Tobago
kern_elliot.name: Kern Elliott
kern_elliot.title: Solutions Architect
